ss.gurmukhi: auQy ihMmq nw dw sUrmw vI rx-BUmI ivc Aw igAw।
ss.unicode: ਉਥੇ ਹਿੰਮਤ ਨਾ ਦਾ ਸੂਰਮਾ ਵੀ ਰਣ-ਭੂਮੀ ਵਿਚ ਆ ਗਿਆ।

bdb.gurmukhi: auQy ihMmq nw dw sUrmw vI rx-BUmI ivc Aw igAw।

en.bdb: He received several wounds and struck his weapons on several others.58.

en.bdb: The warriors of Katoch came with great rage in order to take away the dead body of their Raja Kirpal.59.

ss.gurmukhi: ikRpwl cMd dI loQ lYx leI vYrI-rwjy (BIm cMd Awid) kRoDvwn ho gey ]59]

bdb.gurmukhi: ikRpwl cMd dI loQ lYx leI vYrI-rwjy (BIm cMd Awid) kRoDvwn ho gey ]59]
